description:
Welcome to the first Bristol Machine Learning Meetup! This is an informal/social one with the goal of meeting each other and having some drinks.

Hopefully, if there is a demand for a monthly ML meet-up in Bristol, the next ones are going to be more organised and structured, with a proper place to have talks/presentations.

If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to message me!
title: Bristol Machine Learning: First Meetup
